content: I've added a track proposal here https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-01+Connectathon+26, but I apparently didn't fill out the form correctly, so only the name of the track is listed in the table, and I can't figure out how to edit that information. Is there a way I can edit that entry in the table to provide the additional information for the track?
Oh I see, it's pulling from the table, never mind, I feel silly for having asked :)
